summary: Changes Vorstag into a khajiit, removes his standard armor (for more customization) and makes his Hunting Bow visible in his normal inventory.
descriptionHtml:
Does what it says on the tin.

-Makes Vorstag a Khajiit, though he retains his nord voice acting.
-Makes the hunting bow visible for Vorstag and all other followers who use it. This allows you to remove it if you so choose.
-Removes his standard scale armor, so you can outfit him with clothes or whatever you please.
-Effectively allows you to marry a Khajiit, since Vorstag is normally marriageable.

Conflicts: Will most likely conflict with any mod that changes Vorstag or the follower-specific version of the Hunting Bow.
author: Hibernian
